creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
description: male figure seated in chair holding rod-like object in PL hand; female figure with PR arm extended with small oval shaped object in hand; three figures behind woman at edge of image; drapery at UL; pillars at R; arches in distance
inscription:
Inscription

on verso on mount, in brown: [N87 ex collecz R/ AH.B/ pietro da cortone]
medium: Pen and brown ink with gray wash
title: Tamar Presenting Judah with his Staff and Signet Ring
